product_name: Eton Boost Turbine Hand-Powered Backup Battery
long_description: The Eton Boost Turbine hand-powered backup battery will help you keep your devices charged up and connected. Lightweight, compact and durable, it's perfect for trips, emergencies and everyday use. Hand cranking for 1 min. generates the power needed to make an approximately 30-sec. phone call or send and receive a few text messages. 2,000mAh lithium battery stores enough power to fully charge most smartphones. MicroUSB port accommodates most smartphones; standard USB port can be used to charge many other portable devices. With the press of a button, the LED charge indicator lets you know how much power the Eton Boost Turbine hand-powered backup battery has available.
short_description: The Eton Boost Turbine hand-powered backup battery will help you keep your devices charged up and connected. Lightweight, compact and durable, it's perfect for trips, emergencies and everyday use.
